0: Some people have really stressful lives. So much so, they need to keep a list of what needs to be done each day. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR This gets even more important if you like a toke of weed between dying your hair and eating your lunch. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Police in Murdoch, Western Australia, have posted a pot smoker's "to do" list on Twitter, saying it was located as they searched a property in Cooby on April 30. The list gives some insight into the mind of a stoner. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Are ur Saturdays hectic like this!!! NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR @MurdochPol This is proof stoners are dangerous, he should definitely be arrested! — Brndn (@Brandon0612) April 30, 2015 NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR @MurdochPol At least you don't have to worry about that criminal mastermind anymore. — Texture (@iamtexture) April 30, 2015 NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR @MurdochPol This is proof we need to legalise marijuana.
